resources.string: The signer name hasn\'t been updated
You can add NFC, air-gapped and software keys via this mobile app. If you need to add a wired key, please do so via the Nunchuk desktop app.
It is not recommended for the software keys to have complete control of the wallet. Software keys are not as safe as hardware keys. Are you sure you want to proceed?
It is recommended for the hardware keys to have complete control of the wallet. Software keys are not as safe as hardware keys. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Which key do you want to use?
The PIN code is a security feature that prevents unauthorized access to your key. Please keep it safe. You\'ll need it for signing transactions.
This NFC key has not been initialized. Do you want to initialize it now?
This key has already been added.
Master private key has been initialized
The chain code is a 32-byte of entropy, used for the key picking process. If you are unsure, we recommend that you leave it on automatic.
Let the app generate the chain code
Invalid chain code, it should contains 64 characters from 0 to 9 and a to f
We’ll scan your NFC key again to activate it. This could take a few seconds.\n\nWe’ll give you an encrypted backup file for the key once this process is done.
The encrypted backup file you just saved is required if you want to recover the NFC key later.\n\nYou’ll also need the backup password printed on the back of the card.
Are you sure you want to remove this key?
Note that we will convert the NFC key backup into a software key. On the next screens, you will:
Enter the Backup Password. You can find it on the back of the card (it might be listed under “Backup key”).
Oops, your key is currently being used in a wallet. Please remove the wallet first.
Please remove this key on the device that it was added to.
We detect that there is %1$s in unsealed slots %2$s. Unsealed slots are unsafe. Would you like to sweep it?
We detect that there is %1$s in unsealed slot %2$s. Unsealed slots are unsafe. Would you like to sweep it?
Follow the vendor’s instruction on how to set up your device with a seed phrase.
You might need to enter a PIN and/or a PASSPHRASE directly on COLDCARD.
For COLDCARD devices, please refer to
We found these keys from the device.\nWhich key do you want to use?
Go to Settings → Hardware On/Off → NFC Sharing → Enable NFC.
We highly recommend that you keep a second copy of the Backup Password and store it somewhere safe.
If you verify the backup via the app, please make sure that this device has not been jailbroken or tampered with.
We recommend that you verify the backup to ensure that it works.\n\nPlease select how you want to proceed.
I’ll verify the backup via the app
It looks like your Backup Password is invalid or the backup file has been corrupted. What would you like to do?
Please follow the steps below to verify the backup yourself
Use a decryption tool such as openssl to check if you can decrypt the file using the provided password.
Remove the backup file after you are done.
If you have more than one TAPSIGNERs, please make sure that you scan the correct one. You can find the card ID on the back of the card.
It looks like you have already added this TAPSIGNER. Are you sure you want to use it in the wallet?
No, I want to add a new one
Navigate to Advanced/Tools → Export Wallet → Generic JSON → OK.
Import the file from step 3 on the next screen.
For details on how to use openssl for verification, visit
It looks like your device is in testnet mode. Please change it back to mainnet before continuing.
